summary: Set in a world with memory recording implants, Alan Hakman is a cutter, someone with the power of final edit over people's recorded histories. His latest assignment is one that puts him in danger.
cast: Robin Williams|Mira Sorvino|Jim Caviezel|Mimi Kuzyk|Stephanie Romanov|Tarek Bishara|Genevieve Buechner|Brendan Fletcher|Vincent Gale|Casey Dubois|Liam Ranger|Joely Collins|Michael St. John Smith|Chris Britton|Wanda Cannon|Chaka White|Don Ackerman|Sarah Deakins|George Gordon|Spencer Achtymichuk|Erin Wright|Mig Macario|Emy Aneke|Stephen Dimopoulos|Wendy Noel|Kwesi Ameyaw|Leanne Adachi|Peter Hall|Johnna Wright|Bart Anderson|Stefan Arngrim|Darren Shahlavi|Blu Mankuma|Richard Hendery|Jim Francis|Jason Diablo|Lisa Bunting|Doreen Eby|Andrew Bramley|David Lewis|Elizabeth Urrea|Barbara Krebesova|Kolja Liquette|Elliot Mandelcorn|Ryan Gates|Ian Gschwind|Ellen Kennedy|Mike Jocelyn|Kevin Mundy|Katina Robillard|Lee Walker|Anne Whitmore|Darren Hird|Bill Waters|Robert Brakey|Sharon Simms
title: La memoria de los muertos
